original_text: There were some Jewish men who travelled about to different places. They caused bad spirits to leave people. Some of them wanted to use the name of the Lord Jesus when they did this. These Jews said to the bad spirits, ‘We tell you to come out of these people. We say this with the authority of Jesus, the man that Paul teaches people about.’
korean_text: 이에 돌아다니며 마술하는 어떤 유대인들이 시험삼아 악귀 들린 자들에게 주 예수의 이름을 불러 말하되 내가 바울이 전파하는 예수를 의지하여 너희에게 명하노라 하더라

sentences.original_text: who travelled about to different places
They caused bad spirits to leave people
Some of them wanted to use the name of the Lord Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그 중 일부는 주 예수의 이름을 사용하고 싶어했습니다

sentences.original_text: These Jews said to the bad spirits
We tell you to come out of these people
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 너희에게 이 사람들에게서 나오라고 명령한다

sentences.original_text: We say this with the authority of Jesus
the man that Paul teaches people about
